(at time of closure) | | sat serv 1 =[[Sky (UK)|Sky]] | | sat chan 1 = ''Channel 613| | cable services = 2| | cable serv 1 = [[Telewest]]| | cable chan 1 = Channel 726| | cable serv 2 =[[Virgin Media|NTL]]| | cable chan 2 = Channel 698/69 }} ''For the original Toon Disney, see [[Toon Disney]].'' '''Toon Disney''' was a [[United Kingdom|British]] television channel that aired alongside the British versions of the [[Disney Channel (UK & Ireland)|Disney Channel]] and the [[Playhouse Disney (UK & Ireland)|Playhouse Disney]]. It was launched the same day as [[Playhouse Disney (UK & Ireland)|Playhouse Disney]] and was replaced on 16 March 2006 by [[Disney Cinemagic (UK & Ireland)|Disney Cinemagic]]. It aired the same shows as [[Disney Channel (UK & Ireland)|Disney Channel]], excluding live-action shows such as [[Lizzie McGuire]], [[Smart Guy]] and [[Boy Meets World]]. ==Shows that aired on Toon Disney== * ''[[101 Dalmatians: The Series]]'' * ''[[Aladdin (TV series)|Aladdin]]'' * ''[[American Dragon: Jake Long]]'' * ''[[Buzz Lightyear of Star Command]]'' * ''[[Brandy & Mr. Whiskers]]'' * ''[[Doug|Disney's Doug]]'' * ''[[Disney's House of Mouse]]'' * ''[[Fillmore!]]'' * ''[[Gargoyles (TV series)|Gargoyles]]'' * ''[[Goof Troop]]'' * ''[[Heathcliff and The Catillac Cats]]'' * ''[[Hercules: The Animated Series]]'' * ''[[Inspector Gadget]]'' * ''[[Jumanji (TV series)|Jumanji]]'' * ''[[Jungle Cubs]]'' * ''[[Kim Possible]]'' * ''[[Lilo & Stitch: The Series]]'' * ''[[Lloyd In Space]]'' * ''[[Men in Black: The Series|Men In Black]]'' * ''[[Mickey Mouse Works]]'' * ''[[Pepper Ann]]'' * ''[[Quack Pack]]'' * ''[[Ratz (TV series)|Ratz]]'' * ''[[The Legend of Tarzan]]'' * ''[[Sabrina: The Animated Series]]'' * ''[[Sabrina's Secret Life]]'' * ''[[Teacher's Pet (TV series)|Teacher's Pet]]'' * ''[[Teamo Supremo]]'' * ''[[Timon & Pumbaa (TV series)|Timon & Pumbaa]]'' * ''[[The Adventures of Sam]]'' * ''[[The Buzz on Maggie]]'' * ''[[Recess (TV series)|Recess]]'' * ''[[The Little Mermaid (TV series)|The Little Mermaid]]'' * ''[[The Weekenders]]'' * ''[[The Wuzzles]]'' ==Replacement== From September 2005, a pre-launch promo saying, "[[The Incredibles]]! Coming soon!" aired on all three channels. Soon, another promo aired, this time revealing the name "[[Disney Cinemagic (UK & Ireland)|Disney Cinemagic]]". The promo had [[Mickey Mouse]] wearing his attire from "The Scorcerer's Apprentice". He walked onto a blank white screen, got hold of a magic wand, touched the tip with his finger and transformed it into a [[television]] remote. He pressed a button on the remote and [[hologram]]s of Disney characters come out. On 16 March 2006, Toon Disney UK was showing back-to-back episodes of [[Kim Possible]] before it eventually closed down. It then aired a [[testcard]] saying, "Disney Cinemagic. Coming soon!". This lasted four hours, until 10:00, when it was replaced by Disney Cinemagic. == See also == * [[Toon Disney]] (U.S. version) * [[Disney Cinemagic]] * [[Jetix]] {{Disney}} {{Children's channels in UK & Ireland}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Toon Disney (Uk & Ireland)}} [[Category:Defunct British television channels]] [[Category:Disney television channels in the United Kingdom]] [[Category:European television stubs]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 2000]] [[Category:Television channels and stations disestablished in 2006]] [[Category:Disney Channel]] {{UK-tv-channel-stub}}
